verses.verse: <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5892><s%> 'Assign the cities of <S%H4733>refuge,<s%> of which I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H5414>you<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%>

that the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> who <S%H5221>kills<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>accidentally<s%> or <S%H1847>unintentionally<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H4733>there.<s%> They shall be to you for a refuge from the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

He shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of those <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H1696>declare<s%> his <S%H1697>cause<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city.<s%> They shall <S%H622>take<s%> him into the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H5414>them,<s%> and give him a <S%H4725>place,<s%> that he may live among <S%H3427>them.<s%>

If the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5462>him,<s%> then they shall not deliver up the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> because he <S%H5221>struck<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1097>unintentionally,<s%> and <S%H8130>didn't<s%> hate him <S%H8543>before.<s%>

He shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in that <S%H5892>city<s%> until he <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> until the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall be in those <S%H3117>days.<s%> Then the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> to his own <S%H5892>city,<s%> and to his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> he fled <S%H5127>from.<s%>'"

They set <S%H6942>apart<s%> <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> in the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and Kiriath <S%H7153>Arba<s%> (the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>) in the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H5676>Beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> they <S%H5414>assigned<s%> <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in the <S%H4334>plain<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

These were the <S%H4152>appointed<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and for the <S%H1616>alien<s%> who <S%H1481>lives<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5221>them,<s%> that whoever kills any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally<s%> might <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H4191>there,<s%> and not die by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> until he <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
